com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Class TreeViewerExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • jebl.evolution.trees.TreeChangeListener
      • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.TreeViewerExtension

  • public abstract class TreeViewerExtension
extends TreeChangeListener
    A tree viewer extension is used for creating a custom controls section in the tree viewer. The extension is able to interact with the tree by providing feedback based on selected nodes and is itself able to modify the selected nodes and/or the tree itself.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TreeViewerExtension.Factory
      The factory class that plugins provide via GeneiousPlugin.getTreeViewerExtensionFactories() for creating TreeViewerExtensions

      protected void fireSelectionChanged(TreeSelectionChangeEvent event)
      A TreeViewerExtension should called this method to notify the tree viewer plug-in that it wants to modify the set of selected nodes in the current tree.
      protected void fireTreeChanged(TreeChangeEvent event)
      A TreeViewerExtension should called this method to notify the tree viewer plug-in that it wants to modify the tree being viewed.

      • addTreeChangedListener

        public final void addTreeChangedListener(TreeChangeListener listener)
        Add a listener to be notified when the tree changes.

      • removeTreeChangedListener

        public final void removeTreeChangedListener(TreeChangeListener listener)
        Remove a listener previously added using addTreeChangedListener(jebl.evolution.trees.TreeChangeListener).
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener previously passed as a parameter to addTreeChangedListener(jebl.evolution.trees.TreeChangeListener).

      • fireTreeChanged

        protected final void fireTreeChanged(TreeChangeEvent event)
        A TreeViewerExtension should called this method to notify the tree viewer plug-in that it wants to modify the tree being viewed.
        Parameters:
        event - an event which encapsulates the new tree. If a tree is being modified, the encapsulated tree must be a modified copy of the original tree. Modifying the original tree is not allowed. Instead it should first be duplicated using Utils.copyTree(jebl.evolution.trees.RootedTree, boolean).

      • fireSelectionChanged

        protected final void fireSelectionChanged(TreeSelectionChangeEvent event)
        A TreeViewerExtension should called this method to notify the tree viewer plug-in that it wants to modify the set of selected nodes in the current tree.
        Parameters:
        event - an event which encapsulates the nodes to be selected.
